evernote_file_added: A user added a file to Evernote in a project
evernote_file_removed: A user removed a file from Evernote in a project
evernote_file_updated: A user updated a file in Evernote in a project
evernote_folder_created: A user created a folder in Evernote in a project
evernote_folder_selected: A user linked a Evernote folder to a project
evernote_node_authorized: A user authorized the Evernote addon for a project
evernote_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Evernote addon for a project
evernote_node_deauthorized_no_user: Evernote addon for a project deauthorized
